Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item comes with a range of features tailored to provide unparalleled performance and convenience. Considering its quality and capabilities, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7500. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to experience the benefits of our product at a highly competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in enhancing your experience. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
